Rising for Justice ⚖️

Nov 6, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • national expungement week
  • code for dc
  • justice

We are joined by Gwendolyn Washington, Director of Pro Bono at Rising for Justice, Kelli Shewmaker, Community Outreach Lead with Code for DC, and Charles Landau, volunteer on the Rising for Justice <> Code for DC project. We’ll talk about this partnership, the National Day of Civic Hacking, National Expungement Week, as well as some of what goes into building software like this.
